snippet: Despite a slow economy and political instability, Lebanon’s capital is welcoming new luxury towers and a waterfront art space, and planning other art sites.
abstract: Art scene in Beiruit, Lebanon, is undergoing renaissance despite regional unrest, political instability and economic stagnation; city's ability to contain stark contradictions speaks to its history of surviving conflict and its long-established art scene.
lead_paragraph: Despite a slow economy and political instability, Lebanon’s capital is welcoming new luxury towers and a waterfront art space, and planning other art sites.

headline.print_headline: Beirut’s Art Scene Stirs Amid Tumult
headline.main: Beirut’s Art Scene Stirs Amid Tumult
